reference.shortdesc: The bookrestriction element specifies whether the book is classified or restricted in some way.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The value attribute is required to specify whether there is a restriction on the book.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The bookrestriction element is specialized from data. It is defined in the bookmap module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: For this element, the value attribute specifies any restrictions on the use of the material, such as declaring the information confidential or for licensed use only.
